958160.name: Visual Novel Maker - Darkness Kingdom
958160.description:
New from Ayato Sound Create, Darkness Kingdom is a fantastic well rounded pack for covering any dark, ominous scene your story might need.

Blending retro percussion, choirs and orchestral instruments, reminiscent of 90s game music soundtracks, with music for many different scenarios including battles, boss battles, field jungles, field dungeons, event themes and more, this pack is a great addition to your RPG-themed games and beyond!

Music with orchestration for fantasy, dark themes, danger, horror and more!
30 BGM in .ogg, ogg with loop tag, .mp3, .m4a and .wav formats.
